AbstController - Class in animation
Base class for animation controllers.
AbstController() - Constructor for class animation.AbstController
For some derived controllers, the timing is irrelevant, therefore an empty Constructor is provided.
AbstController(AbstController.RepeatType, float, float) - Constructor for class animation.AbstController
Constructor sets all time related parameters of the applications
AbstController(AbstController.RepeatType, float, float, float, float) - Constructor for class animation.AbstController
Constructor sets all time related parameters of the applications
AbstController.RepeatType - Enum in animation
animation repeat type: RT_CLAMP- runs animation only once within specified time frame RT_CYCLE - runs animation repeatedly, always starting from the beginning RT_OSCILLATE- runs animation repeatedly forward and backward
AbstGeometry - Class in scenegraph
This is the base class for all objects in the scene, which need to be drawn.

AbstNode - Class in scenegraph
Base class for all node objects in the scene graph.
AbstNode() - Constructor for class scenegraph.AbstNode
Default Constructor assigns a default name for the object
AbstNode(String) - Constructor for class scenegraph.AbstNode
Constructor sets translation vector to (0, 0, 0), scale to (1, 1, 1) and rotation matrix to identity matrix (this means no translation, no scaling and no rotation of original object).
AbstNode(AbstNode) - Constructor for class scenegraph.AbstNode
Copy Constructor.

AbstRenderState.renderType - Enum in scenegraph

AbstSceneObject - Class in scenegraph
Base class for scene graph objects and objects who store date for the scene graph objects (e.g. mesh data, which is used by TriangleMesh).
AbstSceneObject() - Constructor for class scenegraph.AbstSceneObject
 
AbstSpatial - Class in scenegraph
Base class for all spatial components in the scene graph.
AbstSpatial() - Constructor for class scenegraph.AbstSpatial
Default Constructor assigns a default name for the object
AbstSpatial(String) - Constructor for class scenegraph.AbstSpatial
Constructor sets translation vector to (0, 0, 0), scale to (1, 1, 1) and rotation matrix to identity matrix (this means no translation, no scaling and no rotation of original object).
